body make sure to stuff firmly enough that it keeps its shape round 32 single_crochet in next 18 stitches 18 round 33 single_crochet decrease six times 12 slip_stitch fasten_off and hide yarn tail ears optional make twvo row 01 magic_ring with 3sc 3 row 02 turn ch1 3inc 6 fasten_off and leave a long tail for sewing k © kuroviolet 2022 / nikkie l 2022 5 assembly sewing the head to the body sew the head to the body using a tight whip stitch the head and body should both have twelve stitches if no additional rounds of decreases were added so they should line up nicely make sure you face your head straight and that it s stuffed firmly enough to prevent wobbling if you find your head is still fairly wobbly try sewing a second round of tight whip stitches keep in mind the head will always wobble a little bit if you use a 4 0mm hook size due to the weight of the yarn and v the polyester fiber sewing the arms to the body line the flat edge of the arm with round thirty-one of the body sew the arm onto the body by sewing through the last row of the arm and row thirty-one the arms should not be right against the head they should be a round or two away to create a sort of shoulder effect sewing the nose optional using a long strand of yarn sew the nose across two to four stitches depending on how big you want it in the middle of the safety eyes between rounds fifteen and sixteen k sewing ears to head optional sew the ears onto the side of head starting underneath round thirteen and finishing above round seventeen the top of the ears should line up with the top edge of the eyes
